attributes.action: Please help to get Squash into the olympics!!
attributes.additional_details: There are thousands of professional players who sadly get upset due to squash not getting in the olympics. After years and years we would have thought that one day could be the day we get to represent our country give it our all and make our country proud of who we are. It is an amazing sport played by many people all over the world. Why isn’t it getting in? We don’t know!!! Please please help anything you could do would help us sooooo much please help!!!
attributes.background: We would like the government or parliament to write to the Olympic committee stating why squash should be in the olympics. It is totally heartbreaking how other sports such as breakdancing can simply get in when there is an amazing racket sport (squash) that is missing out!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the International Olympic Committee.  You could contact the British Olympic Association to share your views:

https://www.teamgb.com/
